tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE court_cases (
  case_id INT,
  case_name VARCHAR(50),
  case_type VARCHAR(50),
  case_status VARCHAR(50),
  deadline_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE case_parties (
  party_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  party_name VARCHAR(255),
  party_type VARCHAR(50),
  case_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES court_cases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE court_cases (
 case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 case_name VARCHAR(255),
 case_description TEXT,
 lawyer_id UUID,
 schedule_date DATE,
 deadline_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE lawyers (
 lawyer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 lawyer_name VARCHAR(255),
 lawyer_email VARCHAR(255),
 law_firm_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE law_firms (
 law_firm_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 law_firm_name VARCHAR(255),
 location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE court_cases (
	case_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	case_name VARCHAR(255),
	client_name VARCHAR(255),
	case_type VARCHAR(50),
	court_date DATE,
	deadline DATE
);

CREATE TABLE lawyers (
	lawyer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	full_name VARCHAR(255),
	specialty VARCHAR(100),
	email VARCHAR(100),
	phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE case_documents (
	document_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	case_id UUID,
	document_name VARCHAR(255),
	uploaded_by VARCHAR(255),
	upload_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE deadlines (
	deadline_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	case_id UUID,
	deadline_date DATE,
	description TEXT,
	reminder_date DATE
);
